title: Club Priv√©: Book IV
description: Alternate cover for this ASIN can be found hereA young woman missing for two years and a father claiming she'd been kidnapped. Do I even dare search for the truth?The disappearance of a former companion, a web of deceit and lies, is leading Carrie Summers to believe that her firm's client, Howard Weiss, is up to no good. When an opportunity arises for her to investigate more deeply, it leads her to a secret that could change everything.In this penultimate installment of M.S. Parker's sizzling series, the intrigue is hot, but the passion is even hotter.
author: M.S. Parker
